plot: Richard tests the new Pagani Zonda F. The boys were given 10,000 pounds each and were told to buy a supercar for less than 10,000 pounds. The catch is that the supercars they bought must be mid-engine and Italian. The end result is Jeremy buying a Maserati Merak (which it claimed to be an SS version), Richard a Ferrari 308 GT4 and James a Lamborghini Urraco. Dame Ellen MacArthur is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Caboose
